cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP port to 70000, which is outside the valid port range (0-65535), will cause socket binding failures.

du.explanation_en: Changing maxMIMO_layers from a number to a string 'two' will cause type validation errors and configuration rejection.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 從數字更改為字符串 'two' 會導致類型驗證錯誤和配置拒絕。
